name: Catch Me If it's Your Turn
name_original: Catch Me If it's Your Turn
description:
Catch Me if it's Your Turn is a small prototype made for a Global GameJam 2021 with a theme "Lost and Found".

OBJECTIVE

The game is for two players. Each player has their own goal.

The thief tries to collect three of the four treasures on the map.

The policeman tries to catch the thief before that.

1. Choose which player would play which role.

2. The thief goes first. His starting position is selected randomly.

Each turn, you can do multiple actions. Each cost one action point.

MOVE

WATCHMAN - Place a helper that will let you see if the policeman steps on the specific space.

STEAL - Steal a treasure.

End Turn

3. After that, it's the policeman's turn.

His Unique actions are:

INSPECTOR - puts an inspector on your current space, to help you see, if thief steps on it in the future.

Once the thief collects the third treasure, the thief wins. 
If policeman steps on a space with a thief on it, he wins.
